result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jessie A Anderson

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jessie A Anderson appeared by video.  Attorney John j Forrestal appeared by video for Jessie A Anderson.  Attorney Joshua Miles Mathy appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

HELD OFF THE RECORD VIA ZOOM. BRANCH 46 IS IN JURY TRIAL ON ANOTHER MATTER AND NOT AVAILABLE FOR TODAY'S HEARING. 
Case in court for Final PreTrial. Defense advised the Court of resolution posture and requested a plea date. State confirmed. Per agreement and request of the parties, Jury Trial date of November 28, 2022 is removed from the Court's calendar. Case adjourned for Plea hearing, Branch 46. Plea hearing scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm. Hearing will be held in Room 113 of the Safety Building.
JusticePoint PreTrial Services Supervision Report dated October 26, 2022; received and filed.

Defendant Jessie A Anderson appeared by video.  Attorney John j Forrestal in Court for Jessie A Anderson.  Attorney Joshua Miles Mathy appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Final PreTrial. Discussion placed on the record. Parties provided an update to the Court and requested a new date. Court granted request. Case adjourned for Final PreTrial and Jury Trial. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. Final PreTrial scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 09:30 am. Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference. Jury Trial scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 09:00 am. Trial will be held in Room 113 of the Safety Building.
JusticePoint PreTrial Services Supervision Report dated September 21, 2022; received and filed.

Defendant Jessie A Anderson in court with attorney John j Forrestal.  Joshua Miles Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

**JUDGE FEISS AND ALL PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.**
Case in Court for Scheduling Conference. Discussion placed on the record. Defense counsel received discovery material from the State. Statements by Defense regarding toxicology reports and viable expert.  Defense counsel requested Final PreTrial and Jury Trial dates. Court ordered parties to submit their Motions in Limine, Jury Instructions, and Witness Lists by the Final PreTrial date. Any Motions are due by the Final PreTrial date. If the parties believe a necessary witness for the State or Defense requires independent representation, they are to make arrangements for that representation through the Public Defender's Office two (2) weeks in advance of the Final PreTrial. Court ordered case adjourned for Final PreTrial and Jury Trial. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. Final PreTrial scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 9:15 am. Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference. Jury Trial scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 09:00 am. Trial will be held in Room 113 of the Safety Building.
JusticePoint PreTrial Services Supervision Report dated July 14, 2022; received and filed.

Defendant Jessie A Anderson in court with attorney John j Forrestal.  Defendant Jessie A Anderson in custody.  Joshua Miles Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Case in Court for Status hearing. Discussion placed on the record. Defense still awaiting complete Discovery. Defense requesting an adjournment. State confirmed. Court granted request. Court Ordered both parties to meet/talk 48 hours in advanced to next hearing. Case adjourned for Status hearing, Branch 46. Status scheduled for July 15, 2022 at 1:45 pm. Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference.
JusticePoint PreTrial Services Supervision Report dated 06-10-2022; received and filed.

Defendant Jessie A Anderson in Court with Attorney John j Forrestal.  Joshua Miles Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

**PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.**
Case in Court for Scheduling Conference. Discussion placed on the record. Parties advised the Court of outstanding discovery material. Case adjourned for Status hearing, Branch 46. Court advised Defendant to continue compliance with JusticePoint. Status hearing scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 08:45 am. Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference.
JusticePoint PreTrial Services Supervision Report dated April 14, 2022; received and filed.
-received and filed.

Defendant Jessie A Anderson in court with Attorney John J Forrestal.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case in Court for Preliminary hearing. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Feiss, Branch 46. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Court found probable cause and bound Defendant over for trial. State filed original Information. Defense counsel waived reading of Information, and entered a plea of Not Guilty on behalf of Defendant. Case adjourned to Branch 46.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint PreTrial Services Supervision Report dated February 17, 2022; received and filed.

Defendant Jessie A Anderson in Court with Attorney John j Forrestal.  Joshua Miles Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Case in Court for Bail/Bond hearing. Parties appeared in Room 113 of the Safety Building. Discussion placed on the record. For reasons stated on the record, Court DENIED State's Motion to Increase Bail. Case adjourned for Preliminary hearing, Branch PE. Court advised Defendant to continue compliance with JusticePoint. Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 18, 2022 at 08:30 am. 
Parties can appear IN-PERSON or via Zoom Video Conference.
Bail/Bond hearing scheduled for January 21, 2022 at 08:30 am will be held IN-PERSON in Room 113 of the Safety Building.

Defendant Jessie A Anderson in court with Attorney John J. Forrestal; both appear in person.  Josh Mathy appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a preliminary hearing. Defense is newly retained and would like time to meet with his client. State would like to address bail. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for January 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint PreTrial Services Supervision Report dated January 12, 2022; received and filed.

Defendant Jessie A Anderson in Court with Attorney Glenn Edward Gaskill.  Joshua Miles Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

**JUDGE FEISS AND ALL PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.**
Case in Court for Bail/Bond hearing. Court reviewed Defense counsel's Motion to Withdraw. Discussion placed on the record. State requested an IN-PERSON bail hearing. Court held colloquy with Defendant regarding new counsel. For reasons stated on the record, Court took NO ACTION AS TO BAIL. State requested Commissioner Phillips address bail at the Preliminary hearing. Court granted Attorney Gaskill's request to appear via Zoom Video Conference for Preliminary hearing. Case adjourned for Preliminary hearing, Branch PE. Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 13, 2022 at 08:30 am. Defendant will appear IN-PERSON in Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility. Attorney Gaskill will appear via Zoom Video Conference.
JusticePoint PreTrial Services Supervision Report dated January 11, 2022; received and filed.
Clerk contacted ADA Mathy and Attorney Gaskill via email regarding Bail/Bond hearing and Motion to Withdraw.
-received, filed, and forwarded to the Judge for review.

No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  
The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Jessie A Anderson in court with attorney Angel L Johnson.  Defendant Jessie A Anderson in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jessie A Anderson appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Feiss, Branch 46. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION IF RELEASED FROM CUSTODY. Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  State request to be heard on bail.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for January 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.  
This hearing will be streamed live on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/a2c51eb2-8d2b-766b-a132-aa68081ac004
